text: Pleuroploca clava, the Persian horse conch is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== This species occurs in Sri Lanka, Indian Ocean. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1846
title: Pleuroploca clava
